reviewText: Fantastic collection! However!!!!!!! To NOT include Never Say Never again (only 6 of Connery's 7 films are in this set) is CRIMINAL!
There is only ONE true James Bond (007) on this planet and that is Sean Connery.  No one has equaled his talents.
I gave these to my father for his birthday and he is thrilled. He is watching them even as I write this review. Thanks for the high quality product and the prompt delivery. A great experience!
